away with his left hand.

comments.author: obdiane

comments.text:
This is the most boring fight scene I have ever seen, most people who see 
this are just thinking "oh they don't make them like they used to" that's 
because they make them better. If they had Bruce Lee and a skilled 
choreographer here you could've seen some really impressive stuff! Go and 
watch The Raid then tell me they made them better in the past.﻿
comments.author: Ted “Teddy4D” Claxton

comments.text:
This movie was made in 1973. No CGI or special effects.

I still consider this a classic fight scene though. I mean, Lee moved so 
fast that they had the use the camera to slow down his moves :)

comments.text:
+Daniel Davies That was not a kick...that was just a pushing kick. And the

of the extras arm on impact.
